lead_paragraph: This division is about one man: Norv Turner. With the San Diego Chargers, he has perhaps the N.F.L.’s most talented roster. But what he does with it — can he finally prove himself an able coach and not only a good offensive coordinator? — will shape the West and perhaps the entire A.F.C. There is little question that Turner will be good for Philip Rivers; mentoring quarterbacks is what he does best. What he has not done so well is win as a head coach (58-82-1).
